sentences.en: After a sneak preview of the film they decided to shelve it.
sentences.cn: 该影片在试映后,他们决定把它搁置起来.

sentences.en: At this point, the chald cliffs shelve down to the beach.
sentences.cn: 在这里, 白垩质的峭壁渐渐向海滩倾斜.

sentences.en: I shelve books in the library, sometimes it gets monotonous, but the pay is not bad.
sentences.cn: 我在图书馆把书整理上架, 有时候,这个工作很无聊, 但是薪水还不错.

sentences.en: King County has shelved plans to build a driving range.
sentences.cn: 金郡已搁置了建造一个高尔夫练习场的计划。

sentences.en: On using diesel oil, put the transfer switch 2 K to shelve.
sentences.cn: 5当使用轻油时, 将转换开关2K扳到轻油档.

sentences.en: On using oil, put the transfer switch 2 K to oil shelve.
sentences.cn: 当使用重油时, 将转换开关2K扳到重油档.

sentences.en: People shelve the out - of - fashion moral icon and espouse the philosophy of egoism.
sentences.cn: 搁置了人民的时尚图标和拥护道德哲学的利己主义.

sentences.en: Responsible for the ordinary maintenance work, including water, electricity, other facilities such as the shelve.
sentences.cn: 负责全店的日常维修工作, 包括水, 电, 货架等其它设施维护.

sentences.en: Since he was going abroad to study , he had to shelve his marriage plans.
sentences.cn: 我们必须搁置我们假期计画, 因为我刚刚失业了.

sentences.en: The company decided to shelve my project.
sentences.cn: 公司决定把我的项目搁置起来.

sentences.en: The project became so complex that we had to shelve it.
sentences.cn: 这个项目变得太复杂了,以至于我们不得不将其搁置起来.

sentences.en: Then, we will show you how to shelve the books readcall numbers according to the System.
sentences.cn: 那麽, 我们会告诉你怎样以国会图书馆分类法,按书号排书.

sentences.en: They may shelve the difficulties for a while, but they can't put them by indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 他们可以暂时不考虑这些困难, 但要永远回避是不可能的.

words.tran_cn: 渐渐倾斜的，逐渐倾斜的
搁置，将某事放到一旁不予考虑

trans.tran_cn: 置于架子上, 缓议, 搁置, 解雇
trans.tran_en: to decide not to continue with a plan, idea etc, although you might continue with it at a later time

trans.tran_cn: 将（书等）放置在架子上，将…搁在一边，装搁架于，罢免
